predictions.text: ISM Services Prices Index for October 2025 will print at or above 57.0.
predictions.verification_criteria: Pass if ISM Services Prices Index (October 2025) is >= 57.0 in the ISM Non-Manufacturing report released in early November.
predictions.rationale: Services input costs remain elevated and energy prices have been firm. Sticky services inflation keeps prices components buoyant.

predictions.text: U.S. CPI (core, MoM, SA) for October 2025 will print between 0.2% and 0.3%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Pass if the BLS CPI release for October 2025 shows core CPI MoM (seasonally adjusted) between +0.2% and +0.3%.
predictions.rationale: Core disinflation is gradual; shelter remains sticky but easing. Recent data point to a stable 0.2–0.3% monthly pace.

predictions.text: University of Michigan 1-year inflation expectations (prelim) for November 2025 will print between 3.0% and 3.5%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Pass if the preliminary University of Michigan Survey of Consumers reports 1-year inflation expectations within 3.0%–3.5% for November 2025.
monitoring_signals: NY Fed Survey of Consumer Expectations
predictions.rationale: Declining gasoline prices vs. tariff headlines likely offset, keeping short-run expectations anchored near recent ranges.

predictions.text: EIA Lower 48 working natural gas in storage will reach at or above 4.00 Tcf in at least one weekly report by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Pass if EIA Weekly Natural Gas Storage (Lower 48 total working gas) shows >= 4,000 Bcf on any report published by 2025-11-30.
predictions.rationale: High production and mild early heating season increase odds of a round-number storage peak near 4.0 Tcf.

predictions.text: Bitcoin (BTC-USD) will trade at or above $78,000 on at least one UTC day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Pass if BTC-USD prints an intraday high >= $78,000 on any exchange aggregated by a major data source (e.g., Yahoo Finance or CoinDesk) by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Funding and basis on major exchanges
predictions.rationale: Falling yields and risk-on tech sentiment could support another test of highs, but macro headwinds cap confidence.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS10) will close at or below 4.25% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Pass if FRED series DGS10 shows a daily close <= 4.25% on any trading day by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Fed communications and term premium estimates
predictions.rationale: Cooling inflation prints and risk events can extend the recent yield decline to 4.25% or below at least briefly.

predictions.text: USD/JPY (JPY=X) will trade at or below 148.00 on at least one UTC trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Pass if USD/JPY intraday low <= 148.00 on any UTC trading day by the deadline (Yahoo Finance: JPY=X).
monitoring_signals: BOJ policy signals and YCC tweaks
predictions.rationale: Lower U.S. yields and the risk of BOJ policy shifts or verbal intervention could briefly strengthen JPY.

predictions.text: ICE Endex Dutch TTF front-month natural gas will settle at or below €35.00/MWh on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Pass if the official ICE Endex settlement for TTF front-month is <= €35.00/MWh on any session by the deadline.
predictions.rationale: High storage and mild weather scenarios could push TTF toward lower bound despite geopolitical risk premia.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, ExxonMobil will announce a formal agreement or MOU to supply power and/or carbon management services to at least one U.S. AI data center operator.
predictions.verification_criteria: Pass if ExxonMobil publishes an official press release or SEC filing naming a U.S. data center partner and describing power supply or CO2 handling for AI operations.
predictions.rationale: CNBC reports advanced talks; AI power needs align with Exxon's gas/CCS strategy, making a formal deal likely near-term.

predictions.text: U.S. JOLTS Quits Rate (total, SA) for September 2025 will print between 2.1% and 2.3%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Pass if BLS JOLTS September 2025 quits rate (seasonally adjusted, total) is within 2.1%–2.3%.
predictions.rationale: Cooling labor demand with still-firm labor market suggests quits stabilize near 2.2% range.

predictions.text: U.S. PCE Price Index excluding food and energy (core, MoM, SA) for October 2025 will print between 0.1% and 0.2%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Pass if BEA reports October 2025 core PCE MoM (SA) within +0.1% to +0.2%.
monitoring_signals: Shelter and core services excluding housing
predictions.rationale: Translation from CPI/PPI points to a tame 0.1–0.2% core PCE as shelter and healthcare revisions drift lower.

predictions.text: From 2025-10-31 close to 2025-11-30 close, Invesco S&P 500 Equal Weight ETF (RSP) will underperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 1.5 percentage points on an adjusted-close basis.
predictions.verification_criteria: Pass if [AdjClose_RSP(11/30)/AdjClose_RSP(10/31)-1] <= [AdjClose_SPY(11/30)/AdjClose_SPY(10/31)-1] - 1.5pp, using Yahoo Finance adjusted closes.
predictions.rationale: AI capex winners continue to dominate returns; breadth remains narrow, favoring cap-weighted over equal-weighted performance.
